DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : The objective study evaluate influence session resistance training sleep pattern elderly people . Methods : Forty men age 65 80 year , sedentary clinically healthy divide two group : control group ( n=18 ) resistance group ( n=22 ) . Both group undergo two polysomnography test , one baseline another either resistance training session ( One Repetition Maximum - Strength Test , resistance group ) without physical exercise ( control group ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Upon completion baseline polysomnography ( PSG ) , volunteer undergo body composition evaluation ( total body mass , height body mass index calculation ) characterize sample . Three familiarization session conduct exercise machine use study , one repetition maximum test ( 1 RM ) complete order quantify training session load . A PSG test conduct day exercise session resistance group , control group second PSG without exercise compare group time . The body composition assessment , adaptation exercise train session hold Center Psychobiology Exercise Studies .
DOC.criteria: male gender sedentary lifestyle age 65 80 year clinically good health ( able practice physical exercise ) know disease cardiovascular , pulmonary , musculoskeletal system , diabetes profession field physical exercise use sleep medication disqualification base upon clinical examination
